missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-}Mission tokens represent explosives. A hero can interact with an explosive ({I}) to
disarm and discard it. If the hero is Fenn or is within 3 spaces of Fenn, the figure disarms and retrieves the explosive instead.
 {-}If an explosive is dropped, place the token Rebel side up. The explosive remains disarmed, and a Rebel figure can retrieve it.
{-}A hero carrying an explosive can interact with the <color="red">AT-ST</color> to place 1 explosive on the <color="red">AT-ST</color>.
{-}At the end of each round, discard all explosives from the <color="red">AT-ST</color>. It suffers 5 {H} for each token discarded.
{-}The Rebels win when all explosives have been disarmed.
{-}The Rebels lose at the end of Round 5, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate Grey
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate Grey
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
"Hurry up!" Fenn barks, charging through the underbrush. Driven by singular purpose, he curses the shortsighted caution of Rebel High Command. They repeatedly denied support, saying it would be too dangerous.

"I guess it's just as well," he says, shaking his head as you continue."Anyone else they sent would've screwed it up."

{-}Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-}Mission tokens represent explosives. A hero can interact with an explosive ({I}) to
disarm and discard it. If the hero is Fenn or is within 3 spaces of Fenn, the figure disarms and retrieves the explosive instead.
 {-}If an explosive is dropped, place the token Rebel side up. The explosive remains disarmed, and a Rebel figure can retrieve it.
{-}A hero carrying an explosive can interact with the <color="red">AT-ST</color> to place 1 explosive on the <color="red">AT-ST</color>.
{-}At the end of each round, discard all explosives from the <color="red">AT-ST</color>. It suffers 5 {H} for each token discarded.
{-}The Rebels win when all explosives have been disarmed.
{-}The Rebels lose at the end of Round 5, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
With the explosives removed and the advantage of the Empire eroded away, Fenn continues onward. With brutal efficiency, he cuts down any Imperial soldiers foolish enough not to flee.

{-}The Rebels win the mission!
{-}Fenn receives the "Veteran Prowess" Reward card.
{-}Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Explosions shake the ground, and fires burn all around. Fenn continues to fight, and scores of enemy soldiers fall.

Yet to no avail. The raging fire drives everyone back with unbearable heat and a choking black smoke. Retreating, Fenn can only watch as the place he bled to liberate burns.

{-}The Rebels lose the mission.
{-}Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Disarm fail
globalEvents.eventText:
Sweat runs down your forehead as you try to disarm the charge. You don't succeed, but at least you don't blow up either. You need to keep trying.

{-}For each {B} result, place 1 strain token on the explosive.

globalEvents.name: Small Victory
globalEvents.eventText:
The walker's husk slams into the ground with a metallic screech before detonating with a massive explosion.

Roll 2 red dice. Each figure within 2 spaces of the defeated <color="red">AT-ST</color> suffers {H} equal to the  {H} results.

eventActions.theText: Alerted by the explosion, snarling bounty hunters storm the clearing.

Trying to stay calm, you start disarming the charge.

Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the explosive, then discard all strain tokens on the explosive. Enter the number of successes below.

globalEvents.name: Disarm Explosive Y1
globalEvents.eventText: You disarm the charge. Discard this token. If you are Fenn or are within 3 spaces of Fenn, disarm and retrieve the explosive instead.

entityProperties.name: Explosive Yellow 1
entityProperties.theText: A charge sits at the top of the stairs.

globalEvents.name: Last Stand
globalEvents.eventText: You disarm the fourth explosive and allow yourself a little breath of relief when you hear the Imperial comlinks crackle and spit out a series of scrambled commands. You realize that the Empire has set a contingency plan in motion.

eventActions.theText:
Which supply crate is the farthest from any hero?

(If there are multiple at the same distance, choose one.)

globalEvents.name: Activate Explosive Grey
globalEvents.eventText: With a sudden shock, you notice that you have missed one charge.

entityProperties.name: Explosive Crate Grey
entityProperties.theText: A charge sits next to the crate.

eventActions.theText: Disarm the explosives (&Explosives disarmed&/6). Disarm the bonus explosive (&Bonus explosive disarmed&/1).

globalEvents.name: Boom boom
globalEvents.eventText:
Suddenly, one of the disarmed explosives you are carrying detonates.

{rebel} discards one carried explosive and suffers 4 {H}. If {rebel} is not carrying an explosive, choose the closest hero who is carrying an explosive to discard it and suffer the damage.

If no Rebel is carrying an explosive, nothing happens.
